title: The Role of Individual Ethics vs. Company Policy

evidences.text: But the question I guess is, you know, is this something that a company can go and mandate or provide you with any guidance that would be, if you're in this situation, do that.

Or is it something where really individual responsibility comes into play, where you have to have a sense of balancing, practically speaking, your work responsibilities with your own ethical mindset, what you think is right?
And that's kind of the big question of this class many students will complain about, is that at the end of the day, I've got my stakeholders, I got measured, I have to work for my company.
And so all we can do is try to be aspirational in some sense.

And as much as I would criticize Google and ACM for doing that, I'm not going to be much better because I won't be able to sit behind you, not most of you, and follow you around and say, that's not epic.
So I just kind of gave up on it.
